trans-unit.source: Reads an XML manifest file into an object representation.
trans-unit.target: Leest een manifestbestand in XML in de weergave van een object.

trans-unit.source: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
trans-unit.target: Het opgegeven XML-manifest leest en retourneert een object-weergave.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input stream.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u een invoerstroom.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream*> property of the resulting manifest object.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee kunt u de invoerstroom in behouden de <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream*>eigenschap van het resulterende manifest object.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream*>

trans-unit.source: Used by <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter"></xref> to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
trans-unit.target: Gebruikt door <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter"> </xref> voor invoer die niet wordt weergegeven in de weergave van het object opnieuw samenstellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest"></xref> object representation of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest"> </xref> object representatie van het manifest.

trans-unit.source: Can be cast to <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest"></xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest"></xref>, or <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest"></xref> to access more specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: Kan worden geconverteerd naar <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest"> </xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest"> </xref>, of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest"> </xref> voor toegang tot meer specifieke functionaliteit.

trans-unit.source: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
trans-unit.target: Het opgegeven XML-manifest leest en retourneert een object-weergave.

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified path name of the input file.
trans-unit.target: De naam van de volledig gekwalificeerde pad van het invoerbestand.

trans-unit.source: For example, the full path may be c:\directory\folder\filename.manifest.
trans-unit.target: Het volledige pad is bijvoorbeeld mogelijk c:\directory\folder\filename.manifest.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream*> property of the resulting manifest object.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee kunt u de invoerstroom in behouden de <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream*>eigenschap van het resulterende manifest object.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream*>

trans-unit.source: Used by <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter"></xref> to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
trans-unit.target: Gebruikt door <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter"> </xref> voor invoer die niet wordt weergegeven in de weergave van het object opnieuw samenstellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest"></xref> object representation of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest"> </xref> object representatie van het manifest.

trans-unit.source: Can be cast to <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest"></xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest"></xref>, or <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest"></xref> to access more specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: Kan worden geconverteerd naar <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest"> </xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest"> </xref>, of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest"> </xref> voor toegang tot meer specifieke functionaliteit.

trans-unit.source: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
trans-unit.target: Het opgegeven XML-manifest leest en retourneert een object-weergave.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the expected type of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u het verwachte type van het manifest.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are <xref uid="langword_csharp_AssemblyManifest" name="AssemblyManifest" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_ApplicationManifest" name="ApplicationManifest" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_DeployManifest" name="DeployManifest" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input stream.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u een invoerstroom.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream*> property of the resulting manifest object.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee kunt u de invoerstroom in behouden de <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream*>eigenschap van het resulterende manifest object.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream*>

trans-unit.source: The path name of the input file.
